teens.name: Orlando
teens.description: Home to world-famous theme parks, Orlando offers thrilling rides, magical experiences, and endless fun.

teens.name: Costa Rica
teens.description: Explore lush rainforests, volcanic landscapes, and beautiful beaches. Perfect for adventure seekers.

teens.name: London
teens.description: Discover iconic landmarks, museums, and vibrant city life. A blend of history and modern fun.

teens.name: Tokyo
teens.description: Experience futuristic tech, unique pop culture, and ancient traditions in a bustling metropolis.

teens.name: Cancun
teens.description: Enjoy stunning white-sand beaches, clear waters, and exciting water sports. Great for groups.

teens.name: Barcelona
teens.description: A vibrant city with stunning architecture, delicious food, and beautiful urban beaches.

twenties.name: Bangkok
twenties.description: A bustling city offering vibrant street life, ancient temples, incredible food, and lively nightlife.

twenties.name: Berlin
twenties.description: Rich in history, art, and an unparalleled nightlife scene. Explore museums and vibrant districts.

twenties.name: Amsterdam
twenties.description: Charming canals, world-class museums, and a unique, liberal atmosphere. Perfect for exploring.

twenties.name: Lisbon
twenties.description: Hilly, coastal capital known for Fado music, historic neighborhoods, and lively nightlife.

twenties.name: Ibiza
twenties.description: Famous for its vibrant nightlife, beautiful beaches, and stunning Mediterranean sunsets.

twenties.name: Sydney
twenties.description: Iconic opera house, beautiful harbor, stunning beaches, and a vibrant urban energy.

thirties.name: Rome
thirties.description: Immerse yourself in ancient history, exquisite art, and world-renowned Italian cuisine.

thirties.name: Paris
thirties.description: The City of Love offers iconic landmarks, fine dining, and unparalleled romantic ambiance.

thirties.name: Maui
thirties.description: Lush landscapes, stunning beaches, and volcanic adventures. Ideal for relaxation and exploration.

thirties.name: Kyoto
thirties.description: Ancient temples, serene gardens, and traditional culture provide a tranquil and enriching experience.

thirties.name: Queenstown
thirties.description: Adventure capital amidst breathtaking scenery. Bungee jumping, hiking, and stunning views.

thirties.name: Santorini
thirties.description: Iconic white-washed villages, stunning sunsets, and volcanic beaches. Perfect for romance.

forties.name: Tuscany
forties.description: Rolling hills, vineyards, and delicious regional cuisine. Perfect for culinary and cultural immersion.

forties.name: Alaska Cruise
forties.description: Explore majestic glaciers, abundant wildlife, and stunning natural beauty in luxurious comfort.

forties.name: Cape Town
forties.description: Stunning natural beauty, vibrant culture, and gateway to incredible wildlife safaris.

forties.name: Machu Picchu
forties.description: Discover ancient Inca history and breathtaking mountain vistas. A truly spiritual journey.

forties.name: Dublin
forties.description: Historic pubs, rich literary heritage, and friendly locals. Experience true Irish charm.

forties.name: Patagonia
forties.description: Experience dramatic landscapes, glaciers, and stunning national parks. An unforgettable natural wonder.

fifties.name: Danube River Cruise
fifties.description: Leisurely explore historic cities and picturesque landscapes along the famous Danube.

fifties.name: Bora Bora
fifties.description: Overwater bungalows, crystal-clear lagoons, and ultimate luxury for unparalleled relaxation.

fifties.name: Florence
fifties.description: Immerse in Renaissance art, architecture, and exquisite Tuscan cuisine. A cultural gem.

fifties.name: Cairo
fifties.description: Explore ancient wonders like the Pyramids and Sphinx, and cruise the historic Nile River.

fifties.name: Sedona
fifties.description: Stunning red rock formations, spiritual vortexes, and outdoor activities for rejuvenation.

fifties.name: Vancouver
fifties.description: Coastal city offering stunning mountain views, urban culture, and outdoor adventures.
